Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game extends Object
Class Game - Main class, creates the necessary implementation objects and starts the game off. To play this game, create an instance of this class. This class is the main class of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. Users can walk around some scenery. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more interesting!
Version:
2.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019)
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
